title: Inception
description: A thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets, but must plant an idea instead.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind pushing Gotham into chaos.

title: Interstellar
description: Explorers travel through a wormhole to save humanity from extinction.

title: Titanic
description: Two lovers from different worlds meet aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: Avatar
description: A marine enters a new world and must choose between his people and the Na'vi.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
description: A young man discovers his royal heritage and fights to protect his kingdom.

title: Baahubali: The Conclusion
description: The epic battle for the throne continues with revenge, justice, and destiny.

title: RRR
description: Two legendary revolutionaries unite against British colonial rule.

title: Ala Vaikunthapuramulo
description: A man discovers he was switched at birth and fights for his rightful place.

title: Arjun Reddy
description: A brilliant but impulsive surgeon spirals after losing the love of his life.

title: 3 Idiots
description: Three friends navigate college life, friendship, and the pressure to succeed.

title: Dangal
description: A father trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.

title: PK
description: An innocent alien questions societal norms and human beliefs.

title: Kabir Singh
description: A passionate surgeon loses control after a breakup and battles his inner demons.

title: Lagaan
description: Villagers challenge British officers to a cricket match to avoid heavy taxes.
